author: jvanzyl
msg: o Working with bob here on getting sysunit to work under surefire i've
changed a few things as sysunit tests are about as funky as tests are
-> If there are JUnit tests then we do the following search
o there are also some things that the standard JUnit runner
seems to allow namely a Class that neither implements or extends
anything from from the junit.framework.* space and has a Suite
method which returns an Object. Sysunit generates these sorts
of tests to avoid a dependency on JUnit.

author: evenisse
msg: Fix the tests counter that print "There are no test to run." when we have tests to run.
